Steps.Message: Update at 14:29 - We're very sorry we've had to switch off your electricity. Our engineers have turned off the power in the France Lane area in the interest of the public's health and safety. This is due to a potentially unsafe situation involving overhead cabling nearby. Due to the nature of the issue, specialist teams are needed to assess the situation, and they have just arrived on site. Once we have more news from them, we'll let you know a timeframe for power to be restored. If you have any questions or concerns our team are always here on 08003163105, but we'll keep you updated with our progress.

We became aware of a power cut at 12:50. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: We were investigating an overhead electricity line fault which caused a power cut in the local area.
